name: The Twisted Enlisted
description:
The Twisted Enlisted is a 4 VS 4 Team Deathmatch where you use your piloting skills to control a Twisted Bot to help your team gain victory! Twist your Bot at any time and Transform into a Jet and Back into a Bot on Command! There are 4 Twisted Bots available, each with its own weapons and stats. (More Credits Coming Soon. For now, the Main Credit goes to "Chris" for the Transforming Robot CC) Roadmap: Balancing of Twisted Bot Stats More Twisted Bots and Weapons New Battlegrounds and Enemies

https://www.coregames.com/games/7aa6b3/twisted-enlisted
